医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
可吞咽胶囊将大量药物直接释放到胃肠道壁中，灵感来自喷气机......受鱿鱼利用喷射器在海洋中推进并射出墨水云的方式的启发，麻省理工学院和诺和诺德的研究人员开发了一种可摄入的胶囊，可将大量药物直接释放到胃壁或消化道的其他器官中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Ingestible-capsule-releases-a-burst-of-drugs-directly-into-the-walls-of-the-GI-tract-Inspired-By-喷气机队.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Ingestible-capsule-releases-a-burst-of-drugs-directly-into-the-walls-of-the-GI-tract-Inspired-By-喷气机队.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df720ff2-0445-4abb-a689-86faee31cc8f Thu, 21 Nov 2024 09:01:37 -0500 Ingestible capsule releases a burst of drugs directly into the walls of the GI tract Inspired By The Jets...
研究表明，电刺激可能对健康肌腱至关重要戈尔韦大学和利默里克大学的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，电刺激可能对于肌腱维持健康至关重要，为肌腱修复和再生提供了新的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Electrical-stimulation-may-be-essential-for-healthy-tendons-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Electrical-stimulation-may-be-essential-for-healthy-tendons-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a31090c2-cae6-4df1-ba5c-7578d94bfb2d Thu, 21 Nov 2024 08:40:58 -0500 Electrical stimulation may be essential for healthy tendons, study suggests
突破性发现可能会带来新型疟疾疫苗和疗法疟疾，特别是严重形式的疟疾，仍然是全球健康和经济负担。它每年导致超过 60 万人死亡，其中大多数是五岁以下的非洲儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Breakthrough-discovery-could-lead-to-novel-malaria-vaccines-and-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Breakthrough-discovery-could-lead-to-novel-malaria-vaccines-and-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e65a6bf2-89af-4941-84f2-2a06dc572983 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 08:34:23 -0500 Breakthrough discovery could lead to novel malaria vaccines and therapies
研究将产前免疫活动与晚年患阿尔茨海默病的风险联系起来麻省总医院布里格姆分校领导的一项研究从参与者出生前就开始跟踪研究，结果可能提供有关阿尔茨海默病起源的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-links-prenatal-immune-activity-to-Alzheimers-risk-in-later-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-links-prenatal-immune-activity-to-Alzheimers-risk-in-later-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faaf3731-dc3b-49f7-b40d-3ca7c76af983 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 08:19:33 -0500 Study links prenatal immune activity to Alzheimer's risk in later life
ProductLife Group (PLG) 收购 Halloran ProductLife Group (PLG) 是生命科学监管、科学、合规和数字化转型咨询服务领域值得信赖的全球领导者，今天宣布收购 Halloran Consulting Group。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/ProductLife-Group-(PLG)-Acquires-Halloran.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/ProductLife-Group-(PLG)-Acquires-Halloran.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a86e09e-3e26-466f-90d4-2898065aa189 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:59:00 -0500 ProductLife Group (PLG) Acquires Halloran
研究：英国五分之一的戒烟者目前吸电子烟根据 UCL（伦敦大学学院）研究人员领导的一项新研究，在英国，戒烟一年以上的人中约有五分之一目前正在使用电子烟，相当于 220 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-One-in- Five-ex-smokers-currently-vape-in​​-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Study-One-in- Five-ex-smokers-currently-vape-in​​-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2edcf5f-a835-4f6e-8df4-6a6ab769d411 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:27:49 -0500 Study: One in five ex-smokers currently vape in England
小的脑穿透分子为治疗侵袭性脑肿瘤带来了希望糖胶肽通过抑制核苷酸合成来选择性杀死胶质母细胞瘤细胞，显示出与替莫唑胺联合使用的治疗选择的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Small-brain-penetration-molecule-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Small-brain-penetration-molecule-offers-hope-for-treating-aggressive-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5fb20a74-174a-43d0-973e-6e64c31d7916 Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:26:00 -0500 Small brain-penetrating molecule offers hope for treating aggressive brain tumors
人工智能可以通过分析声音的细微变化来检测帕金森病伊拉克和澳大利亚的研究人员表示，能够检测人声音细微变化的算法正在成为帕金森病的潜在新诊断工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/AI-could-detect-Parkinsons-disease-by-analyzing-subtle-changes-in-voice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/AI-could-detect-Parkinsons-disease-by-analyzing-subtle-changes-in-voice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5787432e-8a2f-4cf4-b02d-e057fe0d5b8f Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:20:39 -0500 AI could detect Parkinson's disease by analyzing subtle changes in voice
伪装检测增强了脑肿瘤诊断的神经网络研究表明，经过伪装检测训练的 CNN 可以改善 MRI 扫描中的脑肿瘤分类，凸显了非常规训练的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Camouflage-detection-boosts-neural-networks-for-brain-tumor-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Camouflage-detection-boosts-neural-networks-for-brain-tumor-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44b12885-c76f-4ab1-8951-06379fe8046e Thu, 21 Nov 2024 07:07:00 -0500 Camouflage detection boosts neural networks for brain tumor diagnosis
有压力和心理健康症状的孕妇的唾液微生物存在差异研究将口腔微生物与孕产妇心理健康联系起来，揭示了怀孕期间增强心理健康的潜在干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Saliva-microbes-differ-in-pregnant-women-with-stress-and-mental-health-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241121/Saliva-microbes-differ-in-pregnant-women-with-stress-and-mental-health-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50d7eea2-98c8-44c0-adf9-b320b3c983bd Thu, 21 Nov 2024 06:54:00 -0500 Saliva microbes differ in pregnant women with stress and mental health symptoms
